text: إِن يَثۡقَفُوكُمۡ يَكُونُواْ لَكُمۡ أَعۡدَآءٗ وَيَبۡسُطُوٓاْ إِلَيۡكُمۡ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ وَأَلۡسِنَتَهُم بِٱلسُّوٓءِ وَوَدُّواْ لَوۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ

translation.en: If they gain dominance over you, they would be to you as enemies and extend against you their hands and their tongues with evil, and they wish you would disbelieve
translation.id: Jika mereka menangkapmu, niscaya mereka bertindak sebagai musuh bagimu lalu melepaskan tangan dan lidahnya kepadamu untuk menyakiti dan mereka ingin agar kamu (kembali) kafir

translation.en: She that is to be examined
